skills.name: Programming
skills.description: The skill of designing and building computer programs to solve problems and perform tasks.

skills.name: Web Development
skills.description: The skill of creating and maintaining websites, involving front-end and back-end development.

skills.name: Mobile App Development
skills.description: The skill of creating applications for mobile devices, covering iOS, Android, or cross-platform development.

skills.name: Graphic Design
skills.description: The skill of visually communicating ideas through the use of images, typography, and layout.

skills.name: Video Editing
skills.description: The skill of manipulating and rearranging video shots to create a new work.

skills.name: Culinary Arts
skills.description: The skill of preparing and presenting food, including cooking techniques and food safety.

skills.name: Baking and Pastry
skills.description: The skill of creating baked goods and desserts through baking and pastry techniques.

skills.name: Welding
skills.description: The skill of joining materials like metals or thermoplastics through fusion processes.

skills.name: Metal Fabrication
skills.description: The skill of creating metal structures and products through cutting, bending, and assembling.

skills.name: Robotics
skills.description: The skill of designing, building, and programming robots for various applications.

skills.name: Automation
skills.description: The skill of using technology to perform tasks with minimal human intervention.

skills.name: Healthcare Administration
skills.description: The skill of managing and coordinating healthcare facilities, including financial and personnel aspects.

skills.name: Medical Coding
skills.description: The skill of assigning standardized codes to medical procedures for billing and insurance purposes.

skills.name: Digital Marketing
skills.description: The skill of promoting products or services using digital channels like social media, email, and search engines.

skills.name: Market Research
skills.description: The skill of gathering and analyzing information about a market, including competitors and consumer preferences.

skills.name: Data Science
skills.description: The skill of analyzing and interpreting complex data sets to inform business decision-making.

skills.name: Machine Learning
skills.description: The skill of developing algorithms that enable computers to learn patterns and make predictions from data.
